pr_title: Don't emit any securityContext block if there is nothing valuable to put inside.

timeline.message: Don't emit any securityContext block if there is nothing valuable to put inside.

timeline.bodyText: Ought to fix a Snippetizer bug anyway, right?
timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText:
I think Snippetizer had it right already - 
  
    
      kubernetes-plugin/src/main/java/org/csanchez/jenkins/plugins/kubernetes/pipeline/PodTemplateStep.java
    
    
         Line 381
      in
      529e89b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           this.supplementalGroups = Util.fixEmpty(supplementalGroups); 
        
    
  

 but the unit test was setting it to empty string at https://github.com/jenkinsci/kubernetes-plugin/pull/805/files#diff-b71fe20fbec70935a4922665d36879a2R128
replies.author: Vlatombe
